tool_description: Preprocesses raw text by expanding abbreviations, converting numbers to words, handling special characters, and standardizing punctuation for optimal speech synthesis.

input_text.description: Raw text to be normalized for speech synthesis

language_code.description: ISO 639-1 language code (e.g., en, es, fr, de)

error_messages: Empty input text: Provide non-empty text string for normalization.
Unsupported language code: Use a valid ISO 639-1 language code.
Text too long: Input text exceeds 10000 character limit.
usage: Provide input_text and language_code. Optionally set expand_abbreviations to control abbreviation handling. Returns normalized text ready for phonetic conversion.

normalized_text.description: Text with numbers, abbreviations, and special characters normalized

word_count.description: Number of words in normalized text
